programme.title: Dawn of the Dead
Zora živih mrtvaca
programme.desc:
Dawn of the Dead: Directed by Zack Snyder. With Sarah Polley, Ving Rhames, Jake Weber, Mekhi Phifer. A nurse, a policeman, a young married couple, a salesman and other survivors of a worldwide plague that is producing aggressive, flesh-eating zombies, take refuge in a mega Midwestern shopping mall." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0363547/","name":"Dawn of the Dead","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BN2M2ZmU2OGQtNmU5Yi00MTIyLTgwNWMtYjljMzZlYTdiNjBhXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNTAyODkwOQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"A nurse, a policeman, a young married couple, a salesman and other survivors of a worldwide plague that is producing aggressive, flesh-eating zombies, take refuge in a mega Midwestern shopping mall.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0363547/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Senor-Spielbergo"},"dateCreated":"2004-03-29","inLanguage":"English","name":"At last, someone's got it right...","reviewBody":"If you haven't guessed already, I can't sing the praises of this movie enough - at last, a zombie flick that is two very important things.

1) Not a B-Movie; 2) An absolutely cracking A-Movie.

Having just got back from the cinema still amazed with the quality of this film I don't know where to begin. The good acting, the spot on cast, the refreshingly unbearable scares, the "Paul Verhovenesque" completely unnecessary but compellingly disgusting gore, the almost uniquely un-Hollywood ending... It's all there.

What is even more amazing about this movie is that it's [re]creators have also managed to tap into what will surely be the unanimous expectations of the target audience. There are no unwanted and unnecessary messages of family values, cheese, cuddles, and love will conquer all, which is fabulous because it leaves far more room for classic lines like, "Tell him to shoot Burt Reynolds" and then the ketchup-tastic head shot that follows. Now you have to admit, that line really can't fit perfectly in to many movies but in the ever consistent mood of Dawn of the Dead, it's right at home.

Ving Rhames is easily the second best thing in the movie (second only to the fast moving, constantly hungry and occasionally limbless zombies) once he actually starts speaking, and it is welcoming that Sarah Polley's Ana is as composed as she is subtle which is great for the audience because for a change the lead female character is not screaming every 30 seconds because, oh my god, someone is trying to bite me whilst drooling oodles of blood and saliva all over my nice white t-shirt. again!

Her character is only clichéd and therefore flawed once throughout the campaign. As the genius of the group, she is the first to work out that when people are bitten they become very ugly, very quickly and develop a penchant for biting others. However she is still inexplicably opposed to killing the aforementioned soon-to-be cannibals. I don't know about you but whilst she was still talking through the morale dilemma of killing would-be zombies before they turned, I'd already be choosing which sponge I was going to use to clean my shoes after removing my trusty shot gun from a red blob that used to be somebody's face. Maybe that's just me though. us Sagittarians are very impulsive.

Since we all have limited attention spans and I'm mindful of not giving too much away about what happens in the move, I'll wrap up by saying that those of you out there who enjoyed this film's original version and have gone on to enjoy films like Starship Troopers, Robocop, Resident Evil etc., then this is definitely the film for you. And even if the above are not representatives of your particular favourite genre, consider this. I went to the cinema with four friends tonight, one of whom stated before paying his money for the ticket, `I don't know why I'm bothering, I hate [rubbish] like this'. He was the one laughing the loudest and coming closest to vomiting throughout the film, and all of us came out saying, `how many Oscars has this been nominated for'..? IMDb data; ttnr: 0363547, Title: Dawn of the Dead, --- Description: Dawn of the Dead: Directed by Zack Snyder. With Sarah Polley, Ving Rhames, Jake Weber, Mekhi Phifer. A nurse, a policeman, a young married couple, a salesman and other survivors of a worldwide plague that is producing aggressive, flesh-eating zombies, take refuge in a mega Midwestern shopping mall." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0363547/","name":"Dawn of the Dead","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BN2M2ZmU2OGQtNmU5Yi00MTIyLTgwNWMtYjljMzZlYTdiNjBhXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNTAyODkwOQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"A nurse, a policeman, a young married couple, a salesman and other survivors of a worldwide plague that is producing aggressive, flesh-eating zombies, take refuge in a mega Midwestern shopping mall.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0363547/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"Senor-Spielbergo","dateCreated":"2004-03-29","inLanguage":"English","name":"At last, someone's got it right...","reviewBody":"If you haven't guessed already, I can't sing the praises of this movie enough - at last, a zombie flick that is two very important things.

1) Not a B-Movie; 2) An absolutely cracking A-Movie.

Having just got back from the cinema still amazed with the quality of this film I don't know where to begin. The good acting, the spot on cast, the refreshingly unbearable scares, the "Paul Verhovenesque" completely unnecessary but compellingly disgusting gore, the almost uniquely un-Hollywood ending... It's all there.

What is even more amazing about this movie is that it's [re]creators have also managed to tap into what will surely be the unanimous expectations of the target audience. There are no unwanted and unnecessary messages of family values, cheese, cuddles, and love will conquer all, which is fabulous because it leaves far more room for classic lines like, "Tell him to shoot Burt Reynolds" and then the ketchup-tastic head shot that follows. Now you have to admit, that line really can't fit perfectly in to many movies but in the ever consistent mood of Dawn of the Dead, it's right at home.

Ving Rhames is easily the second best thing in the movie (second only to the fast moving, constantly hungry and occasionally limbless zombies) once he actually starts speaking, and it is welcoming that Sarah Polley's Ana is as composed as she is subtle which is great for the audience because for a change the lead female character is not screaming every 30 seconds because, oh my god, someone is trying to bite me whilst drooling oodles of blood and saliva all over my nice white t-shirt. again!

Her character is only clichéd and therefore flawed once throughout the campaign. As the genius of the group, she is the first to work out that when people are bitten they become very ugly, very quickly and develop a penchant for biting others. However she is still inexplicably opposed to killing the aforementioned soon-to-be cannibals. I don't know about you but whilst she was still talking through the morale dilemma of killing would-be zombies before they turned, I'd already be choosing which sponge I was going to use to clean my shoes after removing my trusty shot gun from a red blob that used to be somebody's face. Maybe that's just me though. us Sagittarians are very impulsive.

Since we all have limited attention spans and I'm mindful of not giving too much away about what happens in the move, I'll wrap up by saying that those of you out there who enjoyed this film's original version and have gone on to enjoy films like Starship Troopers, Robocop, Resident Evil etc., then this is definitely the film for you. And even if the above are not representatives of your particular favourite genre, consider this. I went to the cinema with four friends tonight, one of whom stated before paying his money for the ticket, `I don't know why I'm bothering, I hate [rubbish] like this'. He was the one laughing the loudest and coming closest to vomiting throughout the film, and all of us came out saying, `how many Oscars has this been nominated for'..? Sarcastically - yes, but if it was nominated, it'd get my vote. The only thing that could have made it better was Steven Segal instead of Burt Reynolds but you can't have everything.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":10,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":247869,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.3,"contentRating":"R","genre":["Action","Horror"],"datePublished":"2004-06-02","keywords":"survival horror,mall,nurse,shopping mall,zombie","trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"A Guide to the Films of Zack Snyder","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1692647449","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNmQ1OWE3YmItMWUyYy00MzliLWFhZWMtNmJhOWMyYWNhOWJhXkEyXkFqcGdeQW1hZGV0aXNj._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNmQ1OWE3YmItMWUyYy00MzliLWFhZWMtNmJhOWMyYWNhOWJhXkEyXkFqcGdeQW1hZGV0aXNj._V1_.jpg","description":"From 'Dawn of the Dead' and '300' to 'Zack Snyder's Justice League' and 'Army of the Dead,' we break down the stunning visual trademarks of director Zack Snyder.","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001631/","name":"Sarah Polley","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000609/","name":"Ving Rhames","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001616/","name":"Mekhi Phifer"],"director":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0811583/","name":"Zack Snyder"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0086710/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0010962/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0013658/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001681/","name":"George A. A goofy detective specializing in animals goes in search of the missing mascot of the Miami Dolphins." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0109040/","name":"Ace Ventura: Pet Detective","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYmVhNmFmOGYtZjgwNi00ZGQ0LThiMmQtOGZjMDUzNzJhMGIzXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTMxODk2OTU@._V1_.jpg","description":"A goofy detective specializing in animals goes in search of the missing mascot of the Miami Dolphins.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0109040/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Special-K88"},"dateCreated":"2002-02-12","inLanguage":"English","name":"star-making performance for Carrey","reviewBody":"Undeniably juvenile, but funny and entertaining comedy stars Carrey—in his breakthrough role—as a goofy, wildly eccentric pet detective hired to find the missing Miami Dolphins mascot. He's the right man for the job but his childish idiosyncrasies, uncanny bond with animals, and aberrant investigative techniques cause outsiders to question whether or not he can actually make good on his word. Aimed mostly at fans who really enjoy silly humor, others will quickly find it tiresome. There are some amusing cameos by real Dolphin football players (including an engaging Dan Marino) but this film belongs to Carrey and his constant outrageousness. Sure-fire entertainment for fans of this genre. **½"},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":289407,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.9},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Comedy"],"datePublished":"1994-02-04","keywords":"stupidity,nudity,detective,owner dog relationship,master dog relationship","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Official Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3562847001","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMzAyMGUyOGMtNThjNC00ODM0LWI0M2ItNmI1NGExMmMyN2U0XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRodW1ibmFpbC1pbml0aWFsaXplcg@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMzAyMGUyOGMtNThjNC00ODM0LWI0M2ItNmI1NGExMmMyN2U0XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRodW1ibmFpbC1pbml0aWFsaXplcg@@._V1_.jpg","description":"A goofy detective specializing in animals goes in search of the missing mascot of the Miami Dolphins. reunited with his childhood sweetheart." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0109830/","name":"Forrest Gump","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNWIwODRlZTUtY2U3ZS00Yzg1LWJhNzYtMmZiYmEyNmU1NjMzXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTQxNzMzNDI@._V1_.jpg","description":"The presidencies of Kennedy and Johnson, sweeth","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0109830/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"blairgallop7"},"dateCreated":"2007-12-15","inLanguage":"English","name":"Forrest Gump is a movie masterpiece that won't be forgotten and will continue to inspire","reviewBody":"He may have been good in Philadelphia but be is excellent in Forrest Gump.Tom Hanks delivers another great performance in his career by portraying the lovable,king yet not so intelligent character Forrest Gump.It is also Tom Hanks' second straight win for the Best Actor Oscar which he becomes the second man to do said accomplishment after Spencer Tracy.Whilst not as dramatic as Philadelphia,Tom Hanks' performance is just as great in this movie and this movie could possibly be the film of Tom Hanks' career as he used to be a comedy guy who turned to drama in a way which would paved for future stars such as Jim Carrey(The Truman Show),Reese Witherspoon(Walk the Line) and Will Ferrell(Stranger Than Fiction) to name a few.Also staring in this great movie classic are Robin Wright-Penn who plays Jenny,Gary Sinise who was nominated for an Academy Award for his portrayal of programme.title: Në kërkim të së vërtetës
programme.desc: Kur miku i tij i ngushtë vritet ndërsa po hetonte një bandë të dyshimtë, një sherif në pension merr përsipër ta zgjidhë vetë çështjen, por e gjen veten në mes të një rrjeti vdekjeprures korrupsioni.
programme.category: Uestern

programme.title: Luftëtarët e stuhisë
programme.desc: Dy miq të pandarë, do të mësojnë artin e luftimit me anë të elementëve natyrorë dhe do t'i kundërvihen një lordi famëkeq, i cili kërkon të pushtojë vendin tyre...
programme.category: Kinemaja Aziatike

programme.title: Plumbi i humbur
programme.desc: Gary Daniels, Vannessa Vasquez. Një agjent i DEA-s, shkon në Meksikë për të kërkuar ish gruan e tij gazetare, e cila është rrëmbyer nga lideri i një karteli droge.
programme.category: Aksion

programme.title: Shpatarët e mbretit:Fantazia e fundit
programme.desc: Rexhis, mbreti i Lusis, komandon forcat e tij elitare në një luftë të ashpër kundër mbretërisë Nifelhaimit, që kërkon te pushtojë tokat e tij dhe të shtjerë në dorë një kristal me fuqi magjike...
programme.category: Aksion
animacion

programme.title: Motoçiklistët
programme.desc: Laurence Fishburne, Derek Luke. Djali i një ish kampioni në garat me motora, do të futet në këtë botë të rrezikshme dhe plot adrenalinë, me qëllimin e vetëm për të rimarrë titullin, që mbahet prej kohësh nga një njeri i vetëm.
programme.category: Aksion

programme.title: Kung Fu Joga
programme.desc: Jackie Chan, Disha Patani. Dy arkeologë vihen në kërkim të një thesari të humbur dhe fillojnë një aventurë që i çon në vende të ndryshme të botës.
programme.category: Kinemaja Aziatike

programme.title: 1847-ta e zezë
programme.desc: Irlandë, 1847. Kur Zia e Madhe e Bukës shkatërron familjen dhe vendlindjen e tij, një ushtar irlandez që luftonte për Perandorinë Britanike, dezerton ushtrinë dhe kërkon hakmarrje ndaj tiranëve përgjegjës.
programme.category: Aksion

programme.title: Kill Speed-Shpejtësi vrastare
programme.desc: Tre shokë, fluturojnë avionë të ndërtuar vetë, për të transportuar drogë nga Meksika në Amerikë. Gjithçka po shkonte më së miri, derisa një vajzë bukuroshe, e cila fsheh një sekret futet në grupin e tyre...
programme.category: Aksion
krim

programme.title: The outsider - I huaji
programme.desc: Craig Fairbrass, James Caan. Një ushtarak anglez, shkon në Los Anxhelos për të identifikuar trupin e vajzës së tij që mendohet të jetë vrarë. Por kur zbulon se trupi nuk është i saj, ai bën të pamundurën për ta gjetur...
programme.category: Aksion

programme.title: Mythica 2: Kohë të errëta
programme.desc: Melanie Stone, Adam Johnson. Marek dhe miqtë e saj, këtë herë duhet të ndalin Zorlokun, që kërkon të bëjë bashkë copat e një artefakti të vjetër për të sjellë kohë të errëta për njerëzimin.
programme.category: Aksion
fantazi

programme.title: Rrezik në mal
programme.desc: Jason Momoa. Xho është njeri familjar që drejton një kompani transporti drurësh, por një nga shoferët fsheh një sasi të madhe droge në kabinën e tij në mal. Kur Xho dhe i ati zbulojnë drogën, luftë e ashpër nis mes tyre dhe trafikantëve.
programme.category: Aksion
thriller

programme.title: Lista e vrasjeve
programme.desc: Cuba Gooding Jr. Një biznesmen, rastësisht njihet me një vrasës profesionist. Duke menduar se gjithçka është një lojë, ai krijon një listë me 5 njerëzit që do të donte të eliminonte. Por një ditë, emrat e listës fillojnë të zhduken...
programme.category: Aksion

programme.title: Ndëshkuesi
programme.desc: Th. Jane, J. Travolta. Një agjent i fshehtë ka vendosur të lër pas profesionin e lodhshëm dhe të jetojë një jetë të qetë pranë familjes. Kur gruaja dhe djali i vriten, ai rilind nën petkun e 'Ndëshkuesit' dhe nis një hakmarrje personale.
programme.category: Aksion
krim

programme.title: Kthimi i mbretit Kelt
programme.desc: Në vitet 800 e.r, në Skocinë e copëtuar nga lufta, një mbret luftëtar duhet të ndjekë rrëmbyesit e vëllait të tij të vogël brenda një pylli misterioz, që fsheh një forcë të ligë që nga kohët e lashtësisë.
programme.category: Aksion

programme.title: Shtëpia ku lind dielli
programme.desc: Dave Bautista, Amy Smart. Pas një vrasjeje në klubin e natës ku punon një ish polic i sapo liruar nga burgu, ai vihet në kërkim të fajtorëve për të pastruar emrin e tij, ndërkohë që F.B.i-ja dhe disa kriminelë po e kërkojnë me çdo kusht.
programme.category: Aksion
krim

programme.title: Në mendjen time
programme.desc: Maisie Williams, Bill Milner. Kur copëzat e telefonit të tij inteligjent nguliten në kokën e një adoleshenti, ai zbulon se mund të kontrollojë pajisjet elektronike dhe përdor fuqinë e tij të re për t'u hakmarrë.
programme.category: Aksion
fantashkencë

programme.title: Një e shtënë
programme.desc: Kevin Sorbo, Nichelle Aiden, Matthew Reese. Në Tokën e pushtuar nga jashtëtokësorët, një snajper profesionist bllokohet pas vijës së armikut. Tani i vetëm ai duhet të kujdeset jo vetëm për veten, por edhe për një jashtëtokësore bukuroshe.
programme.category: Aksion
fantashkencë

programme.title: Hijet e komplotit
programme.desc: James Woods, Angie Harmon. Pas një karriere të ndritur, një agjent i CIA do të drejtojë një operacion në dukje rutinë: shpartallimi i një trafiku të paligjshëm armësh. Por shpejt ai do të zbuloje se është viktimë e një konspiracioni.
programme.category: Aksion

programme.title: Dy adoleshentët
programme.desc: Dy adoleshentë të larguar nga shtëpia, të cilët përpiqen të mbijetojnë në rrugë me të gjitha mënyrat, bëjnë gabimin më të madh kur joshin një burrë dhe e çojnë në një motel për t'i marrë paratë...
programme.category: Aksion
krim

programme.title: Zjarri me zjarr
programme.desc: Josh Duhamel, Bruce Willis, Rosario Dawson. Pasi bëhet dëshmitar i një vrasjeje, një zjarrfikës detyrohet të futet në programin e mbrojtjes së dëshimtarëve. Por kur vrasësi zbulon identitetin e tij, gjërat marrin një kthesë të frikshme.
programme.category: Aksion
Krim

programme.title: Montana
programme.desc: 2014. Lars Mikkelsen, Duane Henry. Një ish-komando dhe nxënësi i tij 14 vjeçar, planifikojnë të hakmarren kundër një krimineli të rrezikshëm.
programme.category: Aksion

programme.title: Dita e dëshmorëve
programme.desc: Jonathan Bennett, James Cromwell. Në moshën 13 vjeçare, Kajl dëgjon nga gjyshi tre histori për pjesëmarrjen e tij në Luftën e Dytë Botërore. Tani që ai vetë është ushtar, eksperiencat e tij në luftë janë thuajse të njëjtat.
programme.category: Luftë
dramë

programme.title: Shteti i lirë Xhons
programme.desc: Matthew McConaughey. Fymëzuar nga ngjarje të vërteta! Gjatë luftës civile në Amerikë, fermeri Njuton Najt, vihet në krye të një force rebele me fermerë e skllevër për të krijuar një shtet fare të vogël brenda Konfederatës.
programme.category: Dramë
luftë

programme.title: Borëbardha
programme.desc: Eliza Bennett, Jane March. Historia klasike e vëllezërve Grim, në një ritregim të viteve të fundit. Pasi mbretëresha dhe njëkohësisht njerka e saj shpirtkeqe përpiqet ta vrasë, Borëbardha arrin të arratiset në pyllin e magjepsur...
programme.category: Fantazi

programme.title: Vetmitari Xhim
programme.desc: Casey Affleck, Liv Tyler. Në pamundësi për t'ia dalë si shkrimtar në Nju Jork, një 27 vjeçar kthehet në qytezën e tij të lindjes, ku do t'i duhet të përballet me problemet dhe njerëzit prej të cilëve u largua...
programme.category: Dramë

programme.title: Adami
programme.desc: Hugh Dancy, Rose Byrne. Adami, një i ri me autizëm e ka të vështirë të bashkëveprojë me botën dhe njerëzit që e rrethojnë, por ardhja e fqinjës së tij të re do të ndryshojë gjithçka dhe do t'i japë shpresë për një romancë të çiltër...
programme.category: Dramë romantike

programme.title: Wimbledon
programme.desc: Kirsten Dunst. Peter Colt-i eshte ne fund te karrieres se tij si tenist. Ai ftohet te marre pjese ne kampionatin e Uimblledonit. Eshte mundesia e tij e fundit per nje fund te lavdishem.
programme.category: Romancë

programme.title: Dashuri në akull 3
programme.desc: Matt Lanter, Francia Raisa. Pas dëmtimit të partneres së tij, një patinator i famshëm, fillon të bashkëpunojë me një lojtare hokeji. Edhe pse nga dy botë të ndryshme, pasioni për ëndrrën e përbashkët do të bëjë të fillojnë një romancë të bukur...
programme.category: Romancë

programme.title: Fati i emrit
programme.desc: Regjia: Mira Nair. Ashoke kthehet në Indi për t'u martuar me një grua që ia kanë zgjedhur prindërit. Çifti do të shkojë të jetojë në Nju Jork dhe familja e re nuk do ta ketë të lehtë të integrohet në një shoqëri jo fort të hapur për të huajt.
programme.category: Një histori Indie

programme.title: Përpjekjet e pamundura te dashurise
programme.desc: Natalie Portman, Lisa Kudrow, Scott Cohen. Bazuar në romanin e Ayelet Waldman. Historia e 1 gruaje e cila përballet me humbjen e vajzës së porsalindur, ndërkohë që përpiqet të ruajë martesën dhe të krijojë një lidhje me thjeshtrin e saj.
programme.category: Dramë

programme.title: Shoqëri përsëmbari
programme.desc: Dennis Quaid, Topher Grace, Scarlett Johansson. I ulur në detyrë në kompaninë ku punon, një njeri familjar, mëson se djaloshi që e zëvendësoi jo vetëm që tashmë është shefi i tij, por edhe ka rënë në dashuri me të bijën...
programme.category: Romancë

programme.title: Unë buzëqesh përsëri
programme.desc: Lejni është e zgjuar, joshëse dhe amvisë e mirë, por varësia nga droga dhe alkooli, e çon drejt zgjedhjve të gabuara. Ajo detyrohet të reflektojë për sjelljen e saj vetëm kur pasojat e rrezikshme të jetës së dyzyar, pasqyrohen tek familja.
programme.category: Dramë

programme.title: Shkëmbinjtë e lirisë
programme.desc: 1821. Historia fatkeqe e dashurisë midis një vajze të re greke dhe një oficeri turk, gjatë Luftës Greke për Pavarësi kundër Perandorisë Osmane. Kur ajo bëhet një heroinë lufte dhe ai ngarkohet me kapjen e saj, përballja mes dy të dashuruarve do të ketë pa.
programme.category: Dramë
histori
romancë

programme.title: Familjari
programme.desc: Nicolas Cage, Téa Leoni. Një Don Zhuan milioner në Wall Street, zgjohet një mëngjes dhe e gjen veten të martuar me ish të dashurën e tij, të cilën ai e braktisi 13 vite më parë...
programme.category: Portret familjar

programme.title: Muri
programme.desc: Aaron Taylor-Johnson, John Cena. Dy ushtarë amerikanë futen në kurth nga një snajper misterioz dhe mes tyre e vdekjes së sigurt qëndron vetëm një mur, që mund të rrënohet në çdo moment.
programme.category: Luftë
thriller

programme.title: Statusi i Bredit
programme.desc: Ben Stiller, Austin Abrams. Një njeri çon djalin e tij për të vizituar universitete të ndryshme, ku takohet me miq të vjetër që e bëjnë të ndihet inferior ndaj zgjedhjeve që ka bërë në jetë...
programme.category: Komedi
dramë

programme.title: Klonët
programme.desc: Keanu Reeves, Alice Eve. Nje neuro-shkencëtar shkel ligjet dhe rregullat e bioetikës për të sjellë sërish në jetë anëtarët e famljes së tij, të cilët humbën jetën në një aksident automobilistik.
programme.category: Fantashkencë
thriller

programme.title: Të prezantoj me Sofien
programme.desc: Fabio De Luigi. Gabriele, i divorcuar, është një baba i fokusuar vetëm në rritjen e vajzës së tij 10-vjeçare Sofia... Deri ditën kur dashurohet pas Marës, mikeshës së vjetër, e cila nuk i duron dot fëmijët.
programme.category: Komedi

programme.title: Dhuntia e errët
programme.desc: Amandla Stenberg, Mandy Moore. Pasi adoleshentët me fuqi misterioze ndalohen nga qeveria, Rubi, një nga më të fuqishmet, arratiset dhe bashkohet me një grup të larguarish, në një rezistencë për të marrë në dorë e fatit të tyre...
programme.category: Fantashkencë
thriller

programme.title: Mbrëmja e maturës
programme.desc: Meryl Streep, James Corden, Nicole Kidman. Një grup aktorësh të famshëm të Broadway, nisen drejt një qyteti të vogël për të ndihmuar një vajzë adoleshente, të cilës i mohohet e drejta të shkojë në mbrëmjen e maturës...
programme.category: Komedi
muzikal
dramë

programme.title: Prapësia
programme.desc: Keira Knightley. Bazuar në histori të vërtetë. Konkursi 'Miss Bota', 1970 bëri histori pasi Lëvizja e Çlirimit të Grave prishi transmetimin e drejtpërdrejtë. Por kur shfaqja rifilloi, shpallja e fitueses shkaktoi zhurmë akoma më të madhe.
programme.category: Komedi
dramë
histori

programme.title: Me ritmin e ëndrrave
programme.desc: Kur pranimi në universitetin e ëndrrave varet nga performanca e saj në një konkurs vallëzimi, një vajzë studioze formon një grup kërcimi për të mundur skuadrën më të mirë në shkollë. Tani asaj i duhet thjesht të mësojë si të kërcejë.
programme.category: Komedi
kërcim
muzikë

programme.title: Rojtarët e farit
programme.desc: Gerard Butler. Bazuar në ngjarje të vërtetë. Tre rojtarë faresh mbërrijnë në një ishull të pabanuar për turnin e tyre 6-javorë. Atje do të gjejnë diçka që nuk i takon ta mbajnë dhe që i nxit drejt një beteje të tensionuar për mbijetesë.
programme.category: Thriller psikologjik

programme.title: Varfanjakët e pasur 2
programme.desc: Me Christian De Sica. E mbani mend familjen Tuçi? Pak vite më parë fituan 100 milion euro në llotari. Por sot ata kanë kuptuar se lluksi nuk mjafton, pushteti është fitorja e vërtetë. E ku ka më mirë sesa politika.
programme.category: Komedi

programme.title: Tërbimi
programme.desc: 2020. Pasi një nënë e re vret familjen në shtëpinë e saj, një detektive përpiqet të hetojë rastin misterioz, por zbulon se shtëpia është e mallkuar nga një fantazmë hakmarrëse.
programme.category: Horror

programme.title: Lajmëtaret e ndarjes
programme.desc: Për çmimin e duhur, dy shoqet e ngushta Xheni dhe Meli i japin fund çdo romance pa mëshirë. Por kur njëra prej tyre fillon të dëgjojë ndërgjegjen, diçka ndryshon mes dy vajzave...
programme.category: Komedi

programme.title: Zotëria i nderuar
programme.desc: Viti i prodhimit: 1992. Eddie Murphy. Një kriminel nga Florida shfrytëzon kartën e identitetit të një senatori me të cilin ndan të njejtin emër. I futet rrugës së politikës, por me të gjetur dashurinë, i duhet të dalë prej saj, por s'është kollaj.
programme.category: Komedi

programme.title: Zonjusha Petigru
programme.desc: Frances McDormand, Amy Adams. Zonjusha Petigru, një dado që s'ka aspak fat në punën e saj, nuk ka më pothuajse asnjë opsion. Por kur rastësisht fillon punë tek një aktore amerikane, jeta e saj do të ndryshojë brenda një dite të vetme.
programme.category: Komedi romantike

programme.title: Zoti Magu
programme.desc: Zoti Magoo bashkë me qenin e tij e gjen veten në mes të një intrige ndërkombëtare pasi rastësisht i bie në dorë një diamant i çmuar. Përveç kësaj Zoti Magoo ka edhe një problem: nuk sheh mire nga sytë.
programme.category: Komedi

programme.title: Një princ me kostum
programme.desc: Hilary Duff, Chris Carmack. Një gazetare ambicioze, fillon një projekt sekret për revistën 'Cosmo' mbi romancën midis punonjësve të një kompanie. Projekti po shkonte më së miri, derisa takimi me një djalë misterioz, vë gjithçka në dilemë.
programme.category: Komedi romantike

programme.title: Xhaxhai im Dru
programme.desc: Kyrie Irving, Shaquille O'Neal. Një i ri zezak i dëshpëruar për të fituar turneun më të rëndësishëm të basketbollit në Harlem, rekruton një lojtar legjendar të moshuar dhe miqtë e tij pensionistë për të luajtur në skuadrën e tij.
programme.category: Komedi

programme.title: Një javë në vend të Zotit
programme.desc: Të gjitha padrejtësitë e kësaj bote i bien vetëm prezantuesit televiziv Bruce Nolan. Fajëson Zotin për gjithçka dhe Ai vendos ta sfidojë. T'i kalojë atij fuqite e veta për të parë nëse bota do të jete më e mirë?!
programme.category: Jim Carrey

programme.title: Qepe!
programme.desc: Gérard Depardieu, Jean Reno. Dy kriminelë, njëri llafazan dhe tjetri i heshtur, por shumë i rreptë, arrijnë të arratisen së bashku nga burgu. Eh sikur ta dinin se kjo aleancë nuk do të sillte gjë tjetër veçse kaos e telashe...
programme.category: Komedi
krim

programme.title: Familja
programme.desc: Kate McKinnon. Karrieristja Kejti ngarkohet të kujdeset për mbesën e saj të çuditshme, Medin. Kur ajo largohet nga shtëpia, Kejti duhet të përballet me problemet e saj të socilaizimit në mënyrë që të ndihmojë mbesen e saj të kthehet në shtëpi.
programme.category: Komedi

programme.title: Një qytet pothuajse i përkryer
programme.desc: Fabio Volo. Një fabrikë e re do të ndërtohet në një fshat të harruar, me paktin që banorët të gjejnë një mjek që të shërbejë në zonën e tyre. Të motivuar si asnjëherë, ata ideojnë një plan për joshur një mjek nga qyteti, të jetojë në fshat.
programme.category: Komedi

programme.title: Lepurushja e Shtëpisë
programme.desc: Anna Faris, Emma Stone. Jeta e Shellit, lepurushes së Playboy-it, trazohet nga shfaqja e një rivaleje. Pasi e përzënë nga Playboy Mansion, ajo takohet me simotrat e Zeta Alfa Zetas, të cilat kanë po aq nevojë për të sa edhe ajo për ato.
programme.category: Komedi

programme.title: Nëntë jetë
programme.desc: Kur nje biznesmen i fiksuar pas punës, akisdenatlisht bllokohet brenda trupit të maces që bleu për vajzën, ai kupton se për t'u bërë sërish njeri, duhet t'i kushtojë më shumë vëmendje familjes së tij.
programme.category: Komedi
familjar

programme.title: Gjeni vrasës
programme.desc: Stellan Skarsgård, Melissa George. Një polic dhe partnerja e tij e re, hetojnë disa vrasje ku viktimat kanë të gërvishtur në lëkurë një ekuacion.
programme.category: Krim
horror

programme.title: Hanibal, Zanafilla e së keqes
programme.desc: Gaspard Ulliel. Viti i prodhimit: 2008. Pas vdekjes së prindërve të tij gjatë luftës së dytë botërore, Hanibal Lektor i mbushur nga dëshira për t'u hakmarrë, u shndërrua në një vrasës të njohur serial.
programme.category: Horror

programme.title: Nën kthetrat e tigrit
programme.desc: Briana Evigan, Charlie Tahan. Të bllokuar në shtëpi nga një uragan i fuqishëm, një vajzë e re dhe vëllai i saj i vogël, terrorizohen nga një tigër që nuk ndalet përpara asgjëje.
programme.category: Horror
thriller

programme.title: Deklarata
programme.desc: 2003. Michael Caine. Një kriminel i Luftes se II Boterore në fshehtesi bën një jetë të qetë. Deri më sot, autoritetet më të larta të shtetit e kanë mbrojtur, por një grup i ri hetuesish do të përpiqet ta vërë para drejtesise.
programme.category: Thriller

programme.title: Ditën që Toka ndaloi
programme.desc: Keanu Reeves, Jennifer Connelly. Një alien dhe një robot gjigant vizitojnë Tokën. Dr. Helen Banson, arrin të mësojë saktësisht qëllimin e vizitës së tyre dhe përpiqet të ndryshojë fatin që e pret gjithë njerëzimin.
programme.category: Apokalips

programme.title: Vendim tragjik
programme.desc: 2010.D. Mulroney, D. Kruger. Prokurori Stanton dhe gruaja e tij janë në pritje të ethshme për një dhurues të përshtatshëm për vajzën e sëmurë. Në garë me kohën, ai hidhet në kërkim të mjekut që mund ta shpëtojë, por do të gjejë më shumë se aq.
programme.category: Thriller

programme.title: Huta
programme.desc: Ricardo Darín. Aksidentet janë shkaku kryesor i vdekjeve në Argjentinë dhe Sosa është një avokat që përfiton nga fatkeqësitë e të tjerëve. E dashura e tij mjeke e shtyn të dalë nga ky biznes, por e kaluara e tij nuk fshihet aq thjeshtë.
programme.category: Thriller

programme.title: 100 ditë për të jetuar
programme.desc: Kur një vrasës serial rrëmben të fejuarin e një psikologeje të re, asaj i mbetet pak kohë për të zbuluar identitetin e vrasësit dhe, mbi të gjitha, motivin e tij.
programme.category: Thriller
krim

programme.title: Banori
programme.desc: Hilary Swank, Jeffrey Dean Morgan. Pasi ndahet nga bashkëshorti, nje doktoreshë e re gjen apartamentin perfekt, me një qiradhënës shumë korrekt. Por shumë shpejt ajo ka një ndjesi se dikush po e vëzhgon dhe asgjë nuk është ashtu si duket.
programme.category: Thriller
horror

programme.title: The Transporter
Transporter
programme.desc:
The Transporter: Directed by Louis Leterrier, Corey Yuen. With Jason Statham, Shu Qi, François Berléand, Matt Schulze. Frank Martin, who "transports" packages for unknown clients, is asked to move a package that soon begins moving, and complications arise." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0293662/","name":"The Transporter","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTk2NDc2MDAxN15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTYwNDc1NDY2._V1_.jpg","description":"Frank Martin, who "transports" packages for unknown clients, is asked to move a package that soon begins moving, and complications arise.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0293662/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"ccthemovieman-1"},"dateCreated":"2006-06-18","inLanguage":"English","name":"Statham & Style Elevate The Action","reviewBody":"I still rate this pretty high even if the last 10 minutes got totally out of hand and went crazy, action-wise. By "out-of-hand," I mainly refer to the usual excessive action and bad guys-keep-missing-good guys-even-from-short range-type mentality. Actually, a lot of the film is that but it's such a fun movie that I didn't care.

Jason Statham is very cool in the lead and it's he that makes this a decent film. I also enjoyed Shu Qi, a very pretty woman; the witty dialog of Francois Berleand and some stylish, tongue-in-cheek directing by Louis Leterrier and Corey Yuen. Another director whose films are known for their hip styles also co- wrote this: Luc Besson.

Some of the action scenes are outrageous. To Statham's credit, he did most of the action scenes himself. I guess he's a tough guy in real life, too. He's pretty amazing.

A no-brainer-but lots of fun movie.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":294442,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.8},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Action","Crime","Thriller"],"datePublished":"2002-12-11","keywords":"gunfight,premarital sex,mixed martial arts,tape over mouth,motor car","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"The Transporter","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3455779097","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BM2RjMjA2ZGQtMDJlMy00Mzk4LWJjNDYtNGJjMzczNzc3MGQwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BM2RjMjA2ZGQtMDJlMy00Mzk4LWJjNDYtNGJjMzczNzc3MGQwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Pre, "Coming Soon""},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005458/","name":"Jason Statham"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0795517/","name":"Shu Qi"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0776580/","name":"Matt Schulze"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0504642/","name":"Louis Leterrier"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0477035/","name":"Corey Yuen"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0048273/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0079764/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0051228/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000108/","name":"Luc Besson"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0436543/","name":"Robert Mark Kamen"}],"duration":"PT1H32M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: The Devil Wears Prada
Vrag nosi Pradu
programme.desc: The Devil Wears Prada: Directed by David Frankel. With Meryl Streep, Anne Hathaway, Emily Blunt, Stanley Tucci. A smart but sensible new graduate lands a job as an assistant to Miranda Priestly, the demanding editor-in-chief of a high fashion magazine." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0458352/","name":"The Devil Wears Prada","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZjQ3ZTIzOTItMGNjNC00MWRmLWJlMGEtMjJmMDM5ZDIzZGM3XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTkzODUwNzk@._V1_.jpg","description":"A smart but sensible new graduate lands a job as an assistant to Miranda Priestly, the demanding editor-in-chief of a high fashion magazine.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0458352/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"justin_nanu"},"dateCreated":"2006-07-14","inLanguage":"English","name":"I'm a boy. I play football. I liked the movie.","reviewBody":"I think this is one of the most brilliant movies I have seen. It is quite scary. There is one quote that Miranda (Streep) has later in the movie and I think it is dead on 100% correct: "everybody wants to be like us".\n\nThe movie sends a strong message, more than just a quest for self-knowledge. It tells us more than fame isn't everything. It tells us that in order to truly be happy as yourself, you must experience what you want to be. Everybody wants to be famous. Everybody wants to be skinny. Everybody wants to be sexy. Only when you are famous, skinny, sexy, famous can you be satisfied of it. There is a quote a friend of mine used a while back; "You can't be taught what bitter tastes like. No matter how many people tell you that you won't like something bitter, you will want it. Everybody must taste something bitter and learn that they don't like it." This quote applies very well to this film. Go see it!"},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":393450,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.9},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Comedy","Drama"],"datePublished":"2006-11-15","keywords":"magazine,fashion,fashion industry,chick flick,work","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"The Devil Wears Prada","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1425080601","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTc2NjEzNGUtZWRkMy00OTE4LTk2OTktYjI2ODM3NDYwMWI4XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTc2NjEzNGUtZWRkMy00OTE4LTk2OTktYjI2ODM3NDYwMWI4XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Home Video Trailer from 20th Century Fox Home Entertainment"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0004266/","name":"Anne Hathaway"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000658/","name":"Meryl Streep"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0004978/","name":"Adrian Grenier"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0291205/","name":"David Frankel"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0017497/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0174373/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0174362/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0112459/","name":"Aline Brosh McKenna"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1916979/","name":"Lauren Weisberger"}],"duration":"PT1H49M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: A Star Is Born
Zvijezda je rođena
programme.desc: A Star Is Born: Directed by Bradley Cooper. With Lady Gaga, Bradley Cooper, Sam Elliott, Andrew Dice Clay. A musician helps a young singer find fame as age and alcoholism send his own career into a downward spiral." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt1517451/","name":"A Star Is Born","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNmE5ZmE3OGItNTdlNC00YmMxLWEzNjctYzAwOGQ5ODg0OTI0XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTMxODk2OTU@._V1_.jpg","description":"A musician helps a young singer find fame as age and alcoholism send his own career into a downward spiral.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1517451/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"silvaback-13517"},"dateCreated":"2018-10-08","inLanguage":"English","name":"This old Marines thoughts","reviewBody":"I did not want to watch this movie but took my wife to see it, because we both saw the one with Kris Kristofferson and Barbra Streisand, growing up. The crowd was a lot older than we were(we are almost 50) it was the biggest screen they had at our theater and seats a lot but it was maybe half full on Sunday afternoon. Not one dry eye in the place, it had a great tempo and didn't drag on or have any lulls in the story. We were both very pleased and are still engaging in conversations about the movie. It's my opinion to highly recommend to everyone go out and watch a great movie and a heartfelt movie that redefines love in this time and age we live in. programme.title: Cars
Auti
programme.desc:
Cars: Directed by John Lasseter, Joe Ranft. With Owen Wilson, Paul Newman, Bonnie Hunt, Larry the Cable Guy. A hot-shot race-car named Lightning McQueen gets waylaid in Radiator Springs, where he finds the true meaning of friendship and family." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0317219/","name":"Cars","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTg5NzY0MzA2MV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTYwNDc3NTc2._V1_.jpg","description":"A hot-shot race-car named Lightning McQueen gets waylaid in Radiator Springs, where he finds the true meaning of friendship and family.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0317219/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Rectangular_businessman"},"dateCreated":"2007-01-14","inLanguage":"English","name":"Pixar keep the good line","reviewBody":"I found this movie to be enjoyable enough: Even when it is true that it wasn't at the same level than some of previous Pixar films (Such as "Toy Story" and "The Incredibles") it was a good film anyway, with an entertaining story and likable characters.

Despite the strangeness of the premise of a world inhabited by living cars, the execution is fairly convincing, with a neat character development and many funny and heartwarming moments.

Without being perfect, it managed to be something totally worth-watching from beginning to end, and in many ways this could be easily considered one of the best animated films from the year 2006 (Which was a terrible year, in my opinion) 

7.5/10","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":391357,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.1},"contentRating":"G","genre":["Animation","Adventure","Comedy"],"datePublished":"2006-09-06","keywords":"car,car movie,route 66,truck,tow truck","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"How the Best Racing Films Raise the Stakes","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi365149977","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYjgwYTRjOTMtZWIwMy00Nzc2LWJiMDMtMDFkMjRhYTYwY2VmXkEyXkFqcGdeQWFsZWxvZw@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYjgwYTRjOTMtZWIwMy00Nzc2LWJiMDMtMDFkMjRhYTYwY2VmXkEyXkFqcGdeQWFsZWxvZw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"On this IMDbrief, sponsored by Coca-Cola, we're putting the pedal to the metal on the best racing films of all time."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005562/","name":"Owen Wilson"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001372/","name":"Bonnie Hunt"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000056/","name":"Paul Newman"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005124/","name":"John Lasseter"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0710020/","name":"Joe Ranft"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0017902/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0008970/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005124/","name":"John Lasseter"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0710020/","name":"Joe Ranft"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0460146/","name":"Jorgen Klubien"}],"duration":"PT1H57M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.desc: Lucy in the Sky: Directed by Noah Hawley. With Natalie Portman, Jon Hamm, Zazie Beetz, Dan Stevens. Astronaut Lucy Cola returns to Earth after a transcendent experience during a mission to space, and begins to lose touch with reality in a world that now seems too small." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt4682804/","name":"Lucy in the Sky","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNmEzMDkxYzItMjdiNC00YzA5LWJmYWMtMzc2Mjc1MTdjNDZiXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTkxNjUyNQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Astronaut Lucy Cola returns to Earth after a transcendent experience during a mission to space, and begins to lose touch with reality in a world that now seems too small.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt4682804/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"deloudelouvain"},"dateCreated":"2019-12-25","inLanguage":"English","name":"Quite boring to be honest.","reviewBody":"I have to agree with most of the reviewers on here, this movie didn't deliver at all. I wouldn't say the actors were bad, far from that, Natalie Portman and the rest did their job, but the story was just weak, certainly for the first half of the movie. The movie was also much too long, certainly for the story they wanted to tell. I wouldn't waste too much time on this one if I were you.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":5}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":7051,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":4.9},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Drama","Sci-Fi","Thriller"],"datePublished":"2019-10-04","keywords":"astronaut,close up of eye,multiple aspect ratios,character name in title","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Now Playing Only In Theaters","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2276769561","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNjhjNDUxYWItMjkzOC00OWNlLTk2MzItOTRjMjMzMGJlZDhiXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNjhjNDUxYWItMjkzOC00OWNlLTk2MzItOTRjMjMzMGJlZDhiXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Astronaut Lucy Cola's space mission leaves her deeply moved by the experience of seeing her life from afar. programme.title: Pregled proteklog tjedna s Johnom Oliverom
programme.desc: Jedna od najduhovitijih i najsvježijih osobnosti koja se posljednjih godina pojavila na TV-u, John Oliver, stiže na HBO u ovom serijalu koji daje aktualan pogled na tjedne vijesti, politiku i tekuće. Jedna od najduhovitijih i najsvježijih osobnosti koja se posljednjih godina pojavila na TV-u, John Oliver, stiže na HBO u ovom serijalu koji daje aktualan pogled na tjedne vijesti, politiku i tekuće događaje. Svaka epizoda daje Oliveru jedinstvenu platformu odakle može nuditi svoje specifično gledište o svjetskim problemima uz razne posebne goste i segmente.

programme.title: Britanija
programme.desc: Sada u svojoj uzbudljivoj trećoj sezoni, ova epska i vizionarska drama nastavlja pratiti rimsku invaziju na Britaniju. Sada u svojoj uzbudljivoj trećoj sezoni, ova epska i vizionarska drama nastavlja pratiti rimsku invaziju na Britaniju. Nemilosrdni i lukavi general Aulo Plaucije odlučniji je no ikad da osvoji ovu mitsku zemlju na krajnjem rubu Rimskog Carstva. Sada je slomio i razbio moćne druide, ali njegova prava misija da zarobi i ubije Odabranu ostaje nedostižna. Uz snage koje se okupljaju protiv nje, Cait je ranjivija nego što misli. Skrhana događajima u drugoj sezoni, bori se sa svojim putom Odabrane - no možete li ikada zaista pobjeći od svoje sudbine?

programme.title: Before Midnight
Prije ponoći
programme.desc:
Before Midnight: Directed by Richard Linklater. With Ethan Hawke, Julie Delpy, Seamus Davey-Fitzpatrick, Jennifer Prior. We meet Jesse and Celine nine years on in Greece. Almost two decades have passed since their first meeting on that train bound for Vienna." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt2209418/","name":"Before Midnight","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjA5NzgxODE2NF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwNTI1NTI0OQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"We meet Jesse and Celine nine years on in Greece. Almost two decades have passed since their first meeting on that train bound for Vienna.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt2209418/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"flydocfly"},"dateCreated":"2013-01-21","inLanguage":"English","name":"Third time's a Charm!","reviewBody":"I just saw this amazing movie at its Sundance premiere. It's wonderful on so many levels I don't know where to start. The performances are fantastic. If Julie Delpy doesn't get an Oscar nomination it would be a shame (the only stupider thing the Academy could do is have 10 best picture nominations.) Ethan Hawke's performance is brilliant in its own way, however, it's a less showy part and I'm not certain it'll get the recognition it deserves. 

The writing is astounding. Sharp, intelligent, biting, humorous, with staggering subtext, but most importantly--it feels real. If the screenplay doesn't get an Oscar nomination it would be a shame (the only thing stupider the Academy could do is have 15 best picture nominations.)

Rick Linklater is now officially the Jedi master of indie filmmaking (Yoda Soderbergh actually said he's giving up filmmaking.) SLACKERS was only 22 years ago, and Linklater has matured into one of the most original filmic storytellers in the history of the medium. 95% of the movie is two-shots of people talking (the other 5% is people talking at a dinner table and cut aways to the gorgeous Greek landscape.) I don't know any other living filmmaker who could pull this off. There's a one-take during a car drive that lasts probably ten minutes (before a brief cut away), however, it goes on for probably another ten minutes (and Linklater said he could have kept the whole take, but needed to show ruins along the country side and cut away for script purposes, not performance.) There's a 30 minute scene of the two actors in a hotel room and I didn't even notice it (by that time I was so invested in the characters and their actions and emotions I wasn't even aware of time, it wasn't until the post screening Q&A that Linklater mentioned the actual time of the scene.) 

All three, Linklater, Delpy, and Hawke have matured into their rolls (writing, directing, acting) so easily that it's all just great fun for them and the audience. This is a must see for many reasons (including the history of film--there's only one other modern trilogy where the final film is the best--LOTR, and their food budget was probably more than the total cost of BEFORE MIDNIGHT.)

i could go on gushing about this movie ad nauseum, however I'll finish by saying that BEFORE MIDNIGHT is what indie film making (and the Sundance Film Festival) is all about--truly original, creative, unique, interesting characters and their stories, told outside the Hollywood system, by people passionate about their craft (and in this case at the top of their craft).","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":10}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":149974,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.9},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Drama","Romance"],"datePublished":"2013-06-13","keywords":"marriage,hotel,hotel room,writer,dinner","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Theatrical Version","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi4026246681","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTM4NTEzMjcwOV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwMjU2NzIzOQ@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTM4NTEzMjcwOV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwMjU2NzIzOQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"We meet Celine and Jesse 9 years on. Almost 2 decades have passed since that first meeting on a train bound for Vienna, and we now find them in their early 40's in Greece. Before the clock strikes midnight, we will again become part of their story. "},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000160/","name":"Ethan Hawke"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000365/","name":"Julie Delpy"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2089090/","name":"Seamus Davey-Fitzpatrick"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000500/","name":"Richard Linklater"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0273107/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0402483/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0040620/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000500/","name":"Richard Linklater"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000365/","name":"Julie Delpy"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000160/","name":"Ethan Hawke"}],"duration":"PT1H49M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: All the Way
Do kraja
programme.desc:
All the Way: Directed by Jay Roach. With Bryan Cranston, Anthony Mackie, Melissa Leo, Frank Langella. Lyndon B. Johnson becomes the President of the United States in the chaotic aftermath of John F. Kennedy's assassination, and spends his first year in office fighting to pass the Civil Rights Act." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt3791216/","name":"All the Way","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMzUwMTRmMjYtNjI0ZC00Mzc3LTgyZGQtZTA5OTg5ZmVkZDMxXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNDQzMDg4Nzk@._V1_.jpg","description":"Lyndon B. Johnson becomes the President of the United States in the chaotic aftermath of John F. Kennedy's assassination, and spends his first year in office fighting to pass the Civil Rights Act.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt3791216/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"secondtake"},"dateCreated":"2016-05-27","inLanguage":"English","name":"Cranston is great, and the events are even greater....","reviewBody":"All the Way

An impressive cast, centered around the LBJ actor Bryan Cranston, keeps the historical facts alive and relevant.

We often forget Johnson the president between Kennedy and Nixon. He was the most responsible for Vietnam, but also for a huge range of social programs that really make him the ultimate big government guy since Roosevelt. But important programs like Medicare and social legislation like the Civil Rights Act and the Voting Act. Seeing him struggle to make it happen is a kind of poker game, and he does it with famously Johnson candor and humor.

There's no getting around the fact that these are facts. There are no dramatic surprises here (so it's like seeing a movie the second time). But it's a good movie—one that you can see a second time and get a lot from it. There are weak points (some miscast figures like, unfortunately, Martin Luther King Jr. who is played by Anthony Mackie), but overall the drama of the events is kept intense and pertinent.

And Cranston is sublime. If you know him from "Breaking Bad" you will surprised by his depth here. See him, at least. And Johnson, too.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":13876,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.3},"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Biography","Drama","History"],"datePublished":"2016-05-21","keywords":"j. edgar hoover character,lyndon b. johnson character,jacqueline kennedy character,dallas texas,year 1963","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Official Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3039999001","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNzMwMjk5MzI3Nl5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMDYwODY5ODE@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNzMwMjk5MzI3Nl5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMDYwODY5ODE@._V1_.jpg","description":"Lyndon B. Johnson (Bryan Cranston) becomes the President of the United States in the chaotic aftermath of JFK's assassination and spends his first year in office to quickly pass the Civil Rights Act."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0186505/","name":"Bryan Cranston"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1107001/","name":"Anthony Mackie"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0502425/","name":"Melissa Leo"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005366/","name":"Jay Roach"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0005861/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0009119/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0490948/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0770938/","name":"Robert Schenkkan"}],"duration":"PT2H12M"}</script><metacontent="

IMDb data; ttnr: 3791216, Title: All the Way, --- Description: All the Way: Directed by Jay Roach. With Bryan Cranston, Anthony Mackie, Melissa Leo, Frank Langella. Lyndon B. Johnson becomes the President of the United States in the chaotic aftermath of John F. Kennedy's assassination, and spends his first year in office fighting to pass the Civil Rights Act." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt3791216/","name":"All the Way","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMzUwMTRmMjYtNjI0ZC00Mzc3LTgyZGQtZTA5OTg5ZmVkZDMxXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNDQzMDg4Nzk@._V1_.jpg","description":"Lyndon B. Johnson becomes the President of the United States in the chaotic aftermath of John F. Kennedy's assassination, and spends his first year in office fighting to pass the Civil Rights Act.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt3791216/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"secondtake","dateCreated":"2016-05-27","inLanguage":"English","name":"Cranston is great, and the events are even greater....","reviewBody":"All the Way

An impressive cast, centered around the LBJ actor Bryan Cranston, keeps the historical facts alive and relevant.

We often forget Johnson the president between Kennedy and Nixon. He was the most responsible for Vietnam, but also for a huge range of social programs that really make him the ultimate big government guy since Roosevelt. But important programs like Medicare and social legislation like the Civil Rights Act and the Voting Act. Seeing him struggle to make it happen is a kind of poker game, and he does it with famously Johnson candor and humor.

There's no getting around the fact that these are facts. There are no dramatic surprises here (so it's like seeing a movie the second time). But it's a good movie—one that you can see a second time and get a lot from it. There are weak points (some miscast figures like, unfortunately, Martin Luther King Jr. who is played by Anthony Mackie), but overall the drama of the events is kept intense and pertinent.

And Cranston is sublime. If you know him from "Breaking Bad" you will surprised by his depth here. See him, at least. And Johnson, too.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":13876,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.3,"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Biography","Drama","History"],"datePublished":"2016-05-21","keywords":"j. edgar hoover character,lyndon b. johnson character,jacqueline kennedy character,dallas texas,year 1963","trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Official Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3039999001","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNzMwMjk5MzI3Nl5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMDYwODY5ODE@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNzMwMjk5MzI3Nl5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMDYwODY5ODE@._V1_.jpg","description":"Lyndon B. programme.title: Cars 2
Auti 2
programme.desc:
Cars 2: Directed by John Lasseter, Bradford Lewis. With Larry the Cable Guy, Owen Wilson, Michael Caine, Emily Mortimer. Star race car Lightning McQueen and his pal Mater head overseas to compete in the World Grand Prix race. But the road to the championship becomes rocky as Mater gets caught up in an intriguing adventure of his own: international espionage." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt1216475/","name":"Cars 2","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTUzNTc3MTU3M15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwMzIxNTc3NA@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Star race car Lightning McQueen and his pal Mater head overseas to compete in the World Grand Prix race. But the road to the championship becomes rocky as Mater gets caught up in an intriguing adventure of his own: international espi","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1216475/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"atrpunk"},"dateCreated":"2011-06-24","inLanguage":"English","name":"Not what my kids and I expected...","reviewBody":"Espionage, assassinations, sabotage of renewable energy, propaganda, corporate cover-ups, media manipulation and The Mob...

James Bond? Nope. Jason Bourne? Nope. 

Disney/Pixar's CARS 2. Wow. This movie wasn't at all what I was expecting. In the second serving of Lightning McQueen and his pals, they take their show to the international stage in a world championship race-off sponsored by oil-alternative manufacturer, Allinol. But turmoil behind the scenes pulls the gang into a world of spies, the Mob, Big Oil, evil German scientists and hit men. Now they have to save the world before it's too late. Oh, and they race too. The animation is amazing. Water, large balloons, backgrounds during races...pay attention because the quality of the graphics in this one are world-class. There are some goofy, funny moments and some nice one- liners for the older crowd. The themes of being true to yourself and bonds of friendship run strong throughout this film but it's the remainder of the message that worried me. There were non-stop put downs throughout and some other questionable topics. I was beginning to question the G rating when the villain ordered his henchmen to "kill" several other cars. Thinking back to the innocence and the good spirit of the first movie, I began to wonder how we got from there to here. Adventures in racing take a back-seat to the more mature plot of an espionage thriller. Looking around the theater, I could tell that kids younger than 4 or 5 were beginning to get lost. Even my ten-year-old had a hard time understanding the socio-political messages. On top of all that, I'd be willing to bet that Cars 2 is a contender for most guns, explosions and bullets fired in a G-Rated movie. This movie had much more violence than the first one.

Aside from the appropriateness of the movie, it wasn't bad. All the likable characters from the first movie were back with bigger roles like 'Mater & Luigi and there were many new characters added that also brought their own personalities into the mix. To me, this was an espionage-thriller so the added bonus of some comedy made the movie move right along at a good pace. 

It was engaging for me, I enjoyed it, but the entire time I couldn't help but wonder why Disney/Pixar chose to tell this story through a kids movie.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":6}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":173686,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.1},"contentRating":"G","genre":["Animation","Adventure","Comedy"],"datePublished":"2011-06-24","keywords":"car race,car,best friend,spy,conspiracy","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Â“Tokyo PartyÂ”","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1822465049","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjM4MjE0MDk4M15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMzk3OTMzMzE@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjM4MjE0MDk4M15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMzk3OTMzMzE@._V1_.jpg","description":"A clip from Cars 2"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005562/","name":"Owen Wilson"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1249256/","name":"Larry the Cable Guy"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000323/","name":"Michael Caine"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005124/","name":"John Lasseter"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0506977/","name":"Bradford Lewis"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0008970/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0017902/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005124/","name":"John Lasseter"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0506977/","name":"Bradford Lewis"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1557594/","name":"Dan Fogelman"}],"duration":"PT1H46M"}</script><metacontent="

Star race car Lightning McQueen and his pal Mater head overseas to compete in the World Grand Prix race. But the road to the championship becomes rocky as Mater gets caught up in an intriguing adventure of his own: international espionage." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt1216475/","name":"Cars 2","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTUzNTc3MTU3M15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwMzIxNTc3NA@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Star race car Lightning McQueen and his pal Mater head overseas to compete in the World Grand Prix race. But the road to the championship becomes rocky as Mater gets caught up in an intriguing adventure of his own: international espi","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1216475/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"atrpunk","dateCreated":"2011-06-24","inLanguage":"English","name":"Not what my kids and I expected...","reviewBody":"Espionage, assassinations, sabotage of renewable energy, propaganda, corporate cover-ups, media manipulation and The Mob...

James Bond? Nope. Jason Bourne? Nope. 

Disney/Pixar's CARS 2. Wow. This movie wasn't at all what I was expecting. In the second serving of Lightning McQueen and his pals, they take their show to the international stage in a world championship race-off sponsored by oil-alternative manufacturer, Allinol. But turmoil behind the scenes pulls the gang into a world of spies, the Mob, Big Oil, evil German scientists and hit men. Now they have to save the world before it's too late. Oh, and they race too. The animation is amazing. Water, large balloons, backgrounds during races...pay attention because the quality of the graphics in this one are world-class. There are some goofy, funny moments and some nice one- liners for the older crowd. The themes of being true to yourself and bonds of friendship run strong throughout this film but it's the remainder of the message that worried me. There were non-stop put downs throughout and some other questionable topics. I was beginning to question the G rating when the villain ordered his henchmen to "kill" several other cars. Thinking back to the innocence and the good spirit of the first movie, I began to wonder how we got from there to here. Adventures in racing take a back-seat to the more mature plot of an espionage thriller. Looking around the theater, I could tell that kids younger than 4 or 5 were beginning to get lost. Even my ten-year-old had a hard time understanding the socio-political messages. On top of all that, I'd be willing to bet that Cars 2 is a contender for most guns, explosions and bullets fired in a G-Rated movie. This movie had much more violence than the first one.

Aside from the appropriateness of the movie, it wasn't bad. All the likable characters from the first movie were back with bigger roles like 'Mater & Luigi and there were many new characters added that also brought their own personalities into the mix. To me, this was an espionage-thriller so the added bonus of some comedy made the movie move right along at a good pace. 

It was engaging for me, I enjoyed it, but the entire time I couldn't help but wonder why Disney/Pixar chose to tell this story through a kids movie.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":6,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":173686,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.1,"contentRating":"G","genre":["Animation","Adventure","Comedy"],"datePublished":"2011-06-24","keywords":"car race,car,best friend,spy,conspiracy","trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Â“Tokyo PartyÂ”","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1822465049","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjM4MjE0MDk4M15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMzk3OTMzMzE@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjM4MjE0MDk4M15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMzk3OTMzMzE@._V1_.jpg","description":"A clip from Cars 2","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005562/","name":"Owen Wilson","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1249256/","name":"Larry the Cable Guy","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000323/","name":"Michael Caine"],"director":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005124/","name":"John Lasseter","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0506977/","name":"Bradford Lewis"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0008970/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0017902/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005124/","name":"John Lasseter","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0506977/","name":"Bradford Lewis","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1557594/","name":"Dan Fogelman"],"duration":"PT1H46M"</script><metacontent="

programme.title: The Witches
Vještice Roalda Dahla
programme.desc:
The Witches: Directed by Robert Zemeckis. With Chris Rock, Jahzir Bruno, Octavia Spencer, Brian Bovell. A young boy and his grandmother have a run-in with a coven of witches and their leader." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0805647/","name":"The Witches","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNjRkYjlhMjEtYzIwOC00ZWYzLTgyMmQtYjI5M2UzNDJkNTU2XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTkxNjUyNQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"A young boy and his grandmother have a run-in with a coven of witches and their leader.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0805647/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Sleepin_Dragon"},"dateCreated":"2020-11-09","inLanguage":"English","name":"Please make these awful remakes stop.","reviewBody":"Oh Dear,

This should have been good, it needed to be good, sadly it just isn't. It's one of those films where a remake didn't seem to be necessary, but as someone that loved Roald Dahl as a child my interest was peaked.

It's inconsistent throughout, did they perhaps rush it because of Covid? The special effects look decent in parts, and woeful in others, Anne Hathaway displays personality it's fair to say, but her accent..... If anyone remembers Rentaghost, think Miss Popov, she spans countries from Ireland to Russia, it had me chuckling.

Once again, please, please try and give us something new and original, stop taking things that have already been made, and making them ten times worse. An extra point for casting the wonderful Josette Simon.

It made me want to watch Anjelica Huston.

I paid to download it, that money could have gone on something less awful, like a Donny Osmond cd.

Naff, 3/10.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":3}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":34413,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.3},"contentRating":"PG","genre":["Adventure","Comedy","Family"],"datePublished":"2020-10-22","keywords":"based on novel,witch,european literature on screen,taking off shoes,barefoot female","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Official Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1302249753","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZjcxZmI2NzQtYjMxZi00YWE0LWI2M2YtOTBkY2FmNThhYTNhXkEyXkFqcGdeQWFybm8@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZjcxZmI2NzQtYjMxZi00YWE0LWI2M2YtOTBkY2FmNThhYTNhXkEyXkFqcGdeQWFybm8@._V1_.jpg","description":"In late 1967, a young orphaned boy (Bruno) goes to live with his Grandma (Spencer) in the rural Alabama town of Demopolis. As the boy and his grandmother encounter some deceptively glamorous but thoroughly diabolical witches, she wisely whisks our young hero away to an opulent seaside resort. programme.title: Godzilla vs. Kong
Godzilla vs. Kong
programme.desc: Godzilla vs. Kong: Directed by Adam Wingard. With Alexander Skarsgård, Millie Bobby Brown, Rebecca Hall, Brian Tyree Henry. The epic next chapter in the cinematic Monsterverse pits two of the greatest icons in motion picture history against one another - the fearsome Godzilla and the mighty Kong - with humanity caught in the balance." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt5034838/","name":"Godzilla vs. Kong","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZmYzMzU4NjctNDI0Mi00MGExLWI3ZDQtYzQzYThmYzc2ZmNjXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTEyMjM2NDc2._V1_.jpg","description":"The epic next chapter in the cinematic Monsterverse pits two of the greatest icons in motion picture history against one another - the fearsome Godzilla and the mighty Kong - with humanity caught in the balance.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt5034838/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"kenzibit"},"dateCreated":"2021-04-01","inLanguage":"English","name":"Epic battles with an uninspired plot.","reviewBody":"Rating basically for the epic battles in this movie, great special effects that blend perfectly with the environment accompanied by immersive sounds to rumble your speakers. Kudos to all those responsible for that. On the other hand, this movie does a poor job of character personalization and story plot. Had a lot of fake smiles and poor dialogues, did a poor job of making you feel for any character's situation and wanting more from them, it's like the movie pauses when scenes switch from the Kaijus to humans. Characters were introduced for no particular purpose or reason. Story was dull and uninspiring. Wouldn't recommend this movie for the plot or character performances but will recommend it for the epic Kaiju battles and CGI.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":180433,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.4},"contentRating":"E","genre":["Action","Sci-Fi","Thriller"],"datePublished":"2021-03-25","keywords":"monster versus monster,kaiju,godzilla character,king kong character,monsterverse","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Official Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi576962841","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZWVjMmY4ODUtMmYzMC00NDdjLWE4MjMtOWUzMDBlNzczOGMwXkEyXkFqcGdeQWpnYW1i._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZWVjMmY4ODUtMmYzMC00NDdjLWE4MjMtOWUzMDBlNzczOGMwXkEyXkFqcGdeQWpnYW1i._V1_.jpg","description":"From Warner Bros.
